trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator.ServerValidate" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator.ServerValidate" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator" /> 事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs> is passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator.ServerValidate> event handler to provide event data to the handler.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs>传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator.ServerValidate>事件处理程序来提供到处理程序的事件数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator.ServerValidate> event is raised when validation is performed on the server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator.ServerValidate>时服务器上执行验证，则将引发事件。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to perform a custom server-side validation routine on the value of an input control (with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator> control associated with it) in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 此选项，可以对输入控件的值执行的自定义服务器端验证例程 (与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator>与之关联的控件) 的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The value to validate is determined by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 要验证的值由使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs.Value%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Once your code has determined whether the value is valid, store the results of the validation in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs.IsValid%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 一旦你的代码已确定的值是否有效，存储在验证结果的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs.IsValid%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs>, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs>，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs> to pass event data to a custom event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator.ServerValidate> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs>将事件数据传递给自定义事件处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator.ServerValidate>事件。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs> is used to determine the value to validate, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs.IsValid%2A> property is used to store the results of the validation.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs.Value%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs>是用于确定要验证的值，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs.IsValid%2A>属性用来存储验证的结果。

trans-unit.source: The value to validate.
trans-unit.target: 要验证的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the value passes validation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" /> 则指示该值传递验证；否则，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs>类。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的实例的初始属性值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Initial Value
trans-unit.target: 初始值

trans-unit.source: The value of the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: `value` 参数的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the `isValid` parameter.
trans-unit.target: `isValid` 参数的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the value specified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs.Value" /> property passed validation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs.Value" /> 属性指定的值是否通过验证。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the value specified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs.Value" /> property passed validation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" /> 则指示由 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs.Value" /> 属性指定的值通过了验证；否则，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Once your validation routine finishes, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs.IsValid%2A> property to indicate whether the value specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs.Value%2A> property passed validation.
trans-unit.target: 完成验证例程后，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs.IsValid%2A>属性以指示指定的值是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs.Value%2A>传递验证属性。

trans-unit.source: This value determines whether the input control associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator> control passed validation.
trans-unit.target: 此值确定是否与关联的输入的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator>已通过验证的控件。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs.IsValid%2A> property to store the results of the validation.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs.IsValid%2A>属性来存储验证的结果。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value to validate in the custom event handler for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator.ServerValidate" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 获取要在 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator.ServerValidate" /> 事件的自定义事件处理程序中验证的值。

trans-unit.source: The value to validate in the custom event handler for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator.ServerValidate" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator.ServerValidate" /> 事件的自定义事件处理程序中验证的值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs.Value%2A> property determine the value to validate in the custom event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator.ServerValidate> event.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs.Value%2A>属性确定要验证的自定义事件处理程序中的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator.ServerValidate>事件。

trans-unit.source: Notice that you cannot programmatically change this value.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，不能以编程方式更改此值。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs.Value%2A> property to determine the value to validate.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ServerValidateEventArgs.Value%2A>属性来确定要验证的值。
